searchDocs.title: Installation:​
searchDocs.content: Add the following line to your wally.toml file, then re-run wally /wally-package-types as needed.  [dependencies] DexPlayerSave = "ambergracesoftware/dex-playersave@x.y.z"

searchDocs.title: ObserveForPlayer​
searchDocs.content: </> DexPlayerSave.ObserveForPlayer( owner: Player | Observable<Player? >, keyPath: string | number | {string | number}, placeholderValueIfNil: T? ) → T Observes a value within a given player's save, at the provided keypath. If the value is ever "nil", the placeholder value will be resolved as the current state if provided.

searchDocs.title: ObserveLocal​
searchDocs.content: </> DexPlayerSave.ObserveLocal( keyPath: string | number | {string | number}, placeholderValueIfNil: T? ) → T Observes a value within the local player's save, at the provided keypath. If the value is ever "nil", the placeholder value will be resolved as the current state if provided.
